name: leach
content:

[ I or T ] When a chemical substance leaches or is leached from a material, especially soil, it is removed by the action of water passing through the material: The calcium, potassium, and magnesium ions are leached or washed out of the top soil into lower inaccessible subsoil.
[ T ] When soil, etc. has been leached, it has had chemical substances removed from it: The soil has been so heavily leached through intensive farming that it is no longer fertile.
